description:
Just like you, these pants were made for trekking and climbing. Generous vents at the thighs and calves offer great breathability when you work up a sweat. Articulated knees and stretch-panel construction lend themselves to movement in the mountains, so if something were going to hold you back, it certainly wouldn’t be your pants.Zippered vents at the thighs and calves help keep you cool.Stretchy panels help the pants move with you.Hardwearing G-1000® reinforcement where it's needed most.Paneled construction reduces hot spots.4 pockets help keep necessities close, while 1 internal zippered pocket keeps things safe.Articulated knees let the pants move with you.Adjustable cuffs have boot hooks to keep your pants in place.Regular fit for reliable comfort.

        Sustainability








Organic








                      Organically grown content














                      Recycled content
name: Fjallraven Keb Trousers - Men's
